sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../../styles/PatientDashboard.scss'; const PatientDashboard = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); // Mock data - replace with actual data from your backend const patientData = { name: 'John Doe', age: 35, condition: 'Diabetes Type 2', lastCheckup: '2024-03-15', nextAppointment: '2024-04-20', bloodPressure: '120/80', bloodSugar: '110', weight: '75kg', height: '175cm' }; const recentActivities = [ { id: 1, type: 'appointment', title: 'Regular Checkup', date: '2024-03-15', status: 'completed' }, { id: 2, type: 'medication', title: 'Insulin Refill', date: '2024-03-10', status: 'completed' }, { id: 3, type: 'test', title: 'Blood Test Results', date: '2024-03-05', status: 'completed' } ]; const upcomingAppointments = [ { id: 1, doctor: 'Dr. Sarah Wilson', specialty: 'Endocrinologist', date: '2024-04-20', time: '10:00 AM', type: 'Regular Checkup' }, { id: 2, doctor: 'Dr. Michael Brown', specialty: 'Cardiologist', date: '2024-04-25', time: '2:30 PM', type: 'Consultation' } ]; const medications = [ { id: 1, name: 'Metformin', dosage: '500mg', frequency: 'Twice daily', nextDose: '8:00 PM' }, { id: 2, name: 'Insulin', dosage: '10 units', frequency: 'Before meals', nextDose: '7:00 PM' } ]; const renderOverview = () => (
❤️

Blood Pressure

{patientData.bloodPressure}

🩸

Blood Sugar

{patientData.bloodSugar} mg/dL

⚖️

Weight

{patientData.weight}

📏

Height

{patientData.height}

Upcoming Appointments

{upcomingAppointments.map(appointment => (
{new Date(appointment.date).toLocaleDateString()} {appointment.time}

{appointment.doctor}

{appointment.specialty}

{appointment.type}
))}

Current Medications

{medications.map(medication => (

{medication.name}

{medication.dosage} - {medication.frequency}

Next Dose

{medication.nextDose}

))}

Recent Activity

{recentActivities.map(activity => (
{activity.type === 'appointment' ? '📅' : activity.type === 'medication' ? '💊' : '🔬'}

{activity.title}

{new Date(activity.date).toLocaleDateString()}

{activity.status}
))}

Quick Actions

); return (

Welcome back, {patientData.name}

Here's an overview of your health status

{patientData.name}
{activeTab === 'overview' && renderOverview()} {/* Add other tab content here */}
); }; export default PatientDashboard;
